name: places/ChIJ7arYAy1ZwokRlOvrBURxQaY
formattedAddress: 622 Washington St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 622 Washington St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text:
Valentin Peytchinov is a genius of the voice, and I truly believe he is the greatest vocal pedagogue in the world. I have never encountered anyone with such an immediately effective technical approach- one so unbelievably simple, and yet complete. When I went for my first lesson, dejected from years of trying to interpret the cryptic advice of other voice teachers, hopeless and frustrated, Valentin told me "Singing is easy." I laughed in disbelief. Then, shortly thereafter, I stood by him at the piano, and he showed me how easy it really was. I nearly cried, because it was the first time that I truly felt I could have a chance at realizing my crazy dream of becoming an opera singer.

My entire life changed that day. I owe Valentin more than I can ever say. I have witnessed him recover the most damaged, unlistenable voices. He has saved countless singers with seemingly irreparable wobbles, vocal nodules, and all other forms of vocal defects and injuries. Valentin does not flinch in the face of this adversity. He has given these countless singers hope, of the most concrete form: he does not simply reassure them, he does not just delude them into thinking they sound good, and he doesn't even stop at FIXING THEM- he makes them GREAT. You will not regret studying with this master. But you WILL regret not learning from him while you can. I urge you to book a lesson, today.

originalText.text: Bring out the very best in your true voice with Valentin Peytchinov. Valentin's technique and teaching are clear and he is a master at diagnosing any vocal issues- to maximize a singer's potential sound. I can wholeheartedly recommend Valentin's vocal studio!

originalText.text: Valentine is the teacher to end all other teachers. His knowledge on how vocal production works and his ability to maximize the volume and range of your voice while maintaining quality and beauty is of the highest levels. Valentine is a real tactician and I guarantee you will sing high notes youâ€™ve never sung before and it will feel easy! Heâ€™s a kind man that truly cares about your well being and can make you feel comfortable from day one. He knows every major vocal style and teaches an array of singers from classical, jazz, pop and rock. Iâ€™ve been to his group classes with many now famous pop and jazz singers - and I sing opera. Donâ€™t waste your time with anyone else, Valentine is the best.

originalText.text: Valentin is the best voice teacher Iâ€™ve ever encountered. He understands true singing technique and will help you discover your true voice and sing freely and with the spirit. He is kind and encouraging and does not try to break you down to build you up like some voice teachers do. 10/10 recommend forever
